node.title: Kyle Rittenhouse gives his first inteview since being acquitted over fatal shooting and wounding of protesters
node.description: In the interview with Fox News host Tucker Carlson, Mr Rittenhouse gives his opinion of the trial he faced and his plans for the future.
node.content:
["Kyle Rittenhouse, who was acquitted on charges stemming from killing two men and wounding another during the unrest that followed the shooting of a black man by a white police officer in the US, said\u00a0he's \"not a racist person\" and supports the Black Lives Matter (BLM) movement.", "\"This case has nothing to do with race. It never had anything to do with race. It had to do with the right to self-defence,\" the 18-year-old told Fox News host Tucker Carlson in an interview that aired Monday night (local time).", "Mr Rittenhouse is white, as were the men he shot.", "Mr Rittenhouse was 17 last year when he travelled 32 kilometres\u00a0from his home in Antioch, Illinois, to Kenosha, Wisconsin, where there had been\u00a0protests following the August 23 shooting of Jacob Blake by a police officer.", "That shooting and the response in Kenosha \u2014 protests that turned destructive \u2014 became part of the national reckoning over police use of force against black people following George Floyd's death in Minneapolis the previous May at the hands of police.", "Mr Rittenhouse, who was armed with an AR-style semiautomatic rifle, joined others who said they were intent on protecting private property from potential damage on August\u00a025.", "
'I support peacefully demonstrating'
", "", "
The shootings took place during the third night unrest in Kenosha, Wisconsin.
", "During his trial, prosecutors argued\u00a0the teenager was a \"wannabe soldier\" who went looking for trouble that night.", "Mr Rittenhouse countered that he fired in self-defence after he was attacked and in fear for his life.", "\"I thought they came to the correct verdict because it wasn't Kyle Rittenhouse on trial in Wisconsin \u2014 it was the right to self-defence on trial,\" Mr Rittenhouse said in the interview.", "\"And if I was convicted \u2026 no-one would ever be privileged to defend their life against attackers.\"", "He said some people, including some who have made threats against him, are \"too ignorant to look at the facts\".", "The shootings quickly made Mr Rittenhouse a rallying cry for supporters of second amendment rights \u2014\u00a0the US constitutional amendment that allows Americans to keep\u00a0weapons \u2014\u00a0and those angered by the sometimes-violent protests seen in some American cities after Mr Floyd's death.", "Mr Rittenhouse was photographed in a bar before the trial with apparent members of the far-right Proud Boys.", "Mr Rittenhouse's lawyers have said he is not a white supremacist.", "
Rittenhouse says lawyers looking at further action
", "", "
Kyle Rittenhouse was\u00a017 when he shot three people, killing two, during a protest in Wisconsin in 2020.(REUTERS:\u00a0Sean Krajacic)
", "Mr Rittenhouse\u00a0said he felt like he\u00a0has been \"extremely defamed,\" and hinted that he may be taking action.", "\"I have really good lawyers who are taking care of that right now,\" he said.", "He also hit hard out at his former lawyers, John Pierce and Lin Wood, who he said used him to promote a \"cause\" as they raised $US2 million ($2.77 million) for his bail.", "Mr Pierce said he had no comment.", "Mr Wood said the foundation he heads, Fightback Foundation, raised money for Mr Rittenhouse's bail and publicly said the case was a second amendment issue.", "\"I was not an attorney pushing for a cause,\" Mr Wood said.", "\"Fightback has a mission that includes the right to bear arms and self-defence.\"", "
Rittenhouse studying to become a nurse
", "", "
The moment Kyle Rittenhouse collapses after not guilty verdict is read
", "Mr Rittenhouse told Carlson he wished\u00a0the shootings in Kenosha \"never would've happened\".", "\"But it did,\u00a0and we can't change that,\" he said.", "\"But how \u2026 polarised it became is absolutely sickening, like right or left, people using me for a cause that should never have been used as a cause.\"", "Mr Rittenhouse said\u00a0his life was different from what he had planned.", "He said he is taking college prerequisites to become a nurse and hopes to study on campus\u00a0but is now also thinking about studying law.", "He plans to move from the Midwestern United States,\u00a0but is not exactly sure where he will go.", "\"I'm going to go lay low and live my life and enjoy it,\" he said.", "A jury last Friday found Mr Rittenhouse not guilty on charges of homicide, attempted homicide and reckless endangering in the deaths of Joseph Rosenbaum, 36, and Anthony Huber, 26, and the wounding of Gaige Grosskreutz, now 28.", "ABC/AP"]
